text: Respect is a 2021 American biographical drama movie directed by Liesl Tommy. It will be based on the life of singer Aretha Franklin. It stars Jennifer Hudson in the leading role. Forest Whitaker, Marlon Wayans, Audra McDonald, Queen Latifah, Marc Maron, Tituss Burgess, Tate Donovan, and Mary J. Blige also star. The movie is scheduled to be released in the United States on August 13, 2021. ==References== Category:2021 musical movies Category:2020s biographical movies Category:2021 drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:2020s American drama movies Category:Canadian biographical movies Category:Canadian musical movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies about singers Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Respect (2021 movie)
